articles.description: Bharti Airtel’s plan for 5G in India is to go ahead with O-RAN only. It is worth noting that O-RAN technologies are still in the development phase.
articles.content: Bharti Airtel, one of the leading telecom operators in the country, has unveiled its 5G plans in India. The telco has been one of the biggest supporters of Open Radio Access Network (O-RAN) adoption … [+1607 chars]

articles.title: Bajaj Finance: Auto loan business asset quality numbers give shocker in Q1 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The auto finance business was affected severely as almost one-fifth of book turned NPAs followed by a surge in slippages in the personal loan segment.
articles.content:
